card.text: When Spine of Ish Sah enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent.When Spine of Ish Sah is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spine of Ish Sah to its owner's hand.

card.name: Spire of Industry
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control an artifact.

card.name: Staff of Titania
card.text: Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of Forests you control.Whenever equipped creature attacks, create a 1/1 green Forest Dryad land creature token. (It's affected by summoning sickness.)Equip {3}

card.name: Staff of Titania
card.text: Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of Forests you control.Whenever equipped creature attacks, create a 1/1 green Forest Dryad land creature token. (It's affected by summoning sickness.)Equip {3}

card.name: Steel Hellkite
card.text: Flying{2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn.{X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Steel Overseer
card.text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

card.name: Strionic Resonator
card.text: {2}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at.")

card.name: Sunken Hollow
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)Sunken Hollow enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

card.name: Swiftfoot Boots
card.text: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)Equip {1}

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Tawnos, Solemn Survivor
card.text: {2}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of up to one target artifact token you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle
card.text: FlyingWhenever you cast a historic spell, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: The Archimandrite
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.Whenever you gain life, each Advisor, Artificer, and Monk you control gains vigilance and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained.Tap three untapped Advisors, Artificers, and/or Monks you control: Draw a card.

card.name: The Archimandrite
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.Whenever you gain life, each Advisor, Artificer, and Monk you control gains vigilance and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained.Tap three untapped Advisors, Artificers, and/or Monks you control: Draw a card.

card.name: The Brothers' War
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)I — Create two tapped Powerstone tokens.II — Choose two target players. Until your next turn, each creature they control attacks the other chosen player each combat if able.III — The Brothers' War deals X damage to any target and X damage to any other target, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Thirst for Knowledge
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

card.text: Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control die, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.{2}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

card.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)Each artifact creature card in your graveyard has encore. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)
